C

changeIsAvailable(boolean, int) - Static method in class Data.ReadandWrite
Method that takes the bike choice of the customer and updates the database to reflect weather the bike is available (boolean isAvailable) in our bike inventory.
checkCardNumber(String) - Static method in class Model.CreditCard
This method checks the validity of the credit card number.
checkPassword() - Method in class View.LogInView
Method for checking password and user name of registered users.
color - Variable in class Model.Bikes
Color of the respective bike.
Control - package Control
 
cpr - Variable in class Model.Customer
All Strings referring to the customer are defined as private in order to protect the variables.
CreditCard - Class in Model
 
CreditCard() - Constructor for class Model.CreditCard
Constructor of the CreditCard object.
creditCardCvv - Variable in class Model.CreditCard
CVV code of the credit card.
creditCardExpiry - Variable in class Model.CreditCard
Expiry date of the credit card in the MM/YYYY format
creditCardNumber - Variable in class Model.CreditCard
Complete credit card number
Customer - Class in Model
Variables and methods in connection to the Customer Customer details are given by customer input and saved in the customers.txt file.

Constructor for the class Customer.
CustomerView - Class in View
CustomerView Class includes the visual interaction with the customer (= User interface)
